name: Survival Island Pro (Developer X)
description:
How Many Days can you Survive Alone in a paradise island full of Wild Animals? You the Hero of the game was met by a storm in the open sea, while travelling with a team of explorers and you are the only survivor left. Stay Alive as long as you can and remember to use resources wisely as it is limited in content. 

Features Available  for Survival island Pro version includes the following: 

-Better UI

-Better Graphics

-Zombies 

Upcoming Features:

-Campaign

-Pirates

-Upgrades

-Shop

-New Weapons

-Leader Board

-Game will be improved depending on the feedbacks 

-Bug Fixes and Developments in the island

-Dialogue Systems
